name: obsidian-changelog-journal
description: This plugin adds modified notes to daily journal note and auto creates daily notes when obsidian is use from a template,

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.build:prod: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p ./obsidian-changelog-journal && cp ./main.js ./obsidian-changelog-journal/main.js && cp ./manifest.json ./obsidian-changelog-journal/manifest.json
